author: Simon Difford
description: Sweet and sour and turquoise blue.
name: Blue Passion
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
If serving over cubed ice use this recipe: 1½ light white rum, ¾ blue curaçao, ¾ lime juice and ½ sugar syrup
